https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/8J8CN3NL9CvUQgQuII6FWnZYPO6.jpg Casper and Emma spends their summer holiday at Emma's family cabin. They find a chest that Emma's grandfather buried on the beach when he was young. It contains a treasure map that will lead them to a hidden treasure. Casper and Emma Go Treasure Hunting
